description: The best outdoor pant series continues to grow in new and highly requested ways. In addition to the classic fi ts fans love, we’re excited to share brand-new E-waist options for comfort and easyto- wear style, and a new hybrid short that moves from land to water with ease and takes visual cues from our favorite boardshorts.
name: Prana Stretch Zion Hybrid Shorts II, 7" Inseam - Mens
